caption.p: Structures of dihydrochalcones (1– 2), flavones (3–9), flavonols (10– 20), dihydroflavonols (22– 33), flavanones (34-42), isoflavones (43– 70), isoflavanones (71), coumaronochromones (72– 74), chromones (75–82), lignans (83–84), terpenoids (85–92) and other compounds (93–107) from Eriosema spp.
